snippet: The SoHo cocktail bar will hold a fund-raiser on Nov. 11 to benefit two causes: Hurricane Sandy victims and Murray Stenson, a Seattle-based bartender.
abstract: The SoHo cocktail bar will hold a fund-raiser on Nov. 11 to benefit two causes: Hurricane Sandy victims and Murray Stenson, a Seattle-based bartender.

headline.main: Bartenders Pitch In for Pegu Club's Storm Benefit
